detail_desc: Leather sandals with thermoplastic rubber (TPR) insoles and rubber soles.
V-neck slipover in fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, armholes and hem.
Fully lined, glittery swimsuit with spaghetti shoulder straps that join at the back and padded cups with removable inserts.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace details, a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist and narrow ties at the sides.
Sports tops in fast-drying functional fabric with a mesh racer back and an elasticated hem. Lined at the front.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.

Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a rounded, frill-trimmed collar in woven fabric, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, dropped shoulders and long, wide sleeves with ribbing at the cuffs. Soft brushed inside. The polyester content of the sweatshirt is recycled.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Polo-neck poncho in a jacquard knit with a fringed hem.
5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details.
Pointelle top in soft cotton jersey with a gentle V-neck, decorative buttons down the front and short sleeves with overlocked hems.
Short, fitted dress in gathered jersey with a sweetheart neckline and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Lined.

Playsuit in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with a collar, buttons at the top and flap chest pockets. Gathered yoke, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam with wide elastication at the waist and a detachable fabric belt with a covered buckle. Side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Lace Brazilian briefs with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and half-string back.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Vest tops in ribbed cotton jersey with a visible elastic trim at the top, decorative buttons at the front and narrow, adjustable elastic shoulder straps.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist. Fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and tapered legs.
Thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset and string back.

Chimi x H&M. We have teamed up with Chimi Eyewear to create three updated versions of the brand’s iconic sunglasses. This style has a rectangular silhouette with flat lenses. The frames are made from high-quality cellulose acetate that is both BPA- and phthalate-free. The lenses have UV 400 filters for 100% UV-protection, and the sidepieces and front are connected with seven-barrel stainless steel hinges. Text print on the inside of one sidepiece. Supplied with a hard case, cleaning cloth and a drawstring bag. Available in three summery pastel shades as well as in stylish black. Total width 14.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in satin with lace details. Wrapover, lace-trimmed V-neck with a frill on the shoulders and a seam at the waist with a flounce to the hem. Unlined.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a print motif on the front, a round neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with elastication and a decorative drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, buttons down the front, short puff sleeves with smocked trims and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Cotton jersey vest tops in a narrow cut at the top with a flare top the hem. Rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Padded gilet with a detachable, faux-fur trimmed hood and stand-up collar. Zip down the front, side pocket and imitation leather details. Lined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, pearly buttons at the front, flap front pockets and a gently tapered waist. Lined.
Patterned tights with an elasticated waist. 40 denier.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, wrapover top, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and a concealed zip in the side. Gathered seam at the waist with a detachable tie belt, and flared, draping skirt. Lined.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard and a detachable, lined hood with a fastening at the front. Discreet, zipped handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining in recycled polyester.
Straight-style T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Fitted sports top in fast-drying functional fabric with short raglan sleeves and ventilating mesh panels at the sides. 67% of the polyester is recycled.
Coat in a soft, felted wool blend with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front, a tie belt at the waist and welt side pockets. Lined.

Long-sleeved top in soft cotton sweatshirt fabric with a printed and embroidered motif on the front, a fabric appliqué on one sleeve and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Jacket in cotton piqué with a small, ribbed stand-up collar and appliqué on the front. Zip down the front, welt side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.

Short, wide dress in patterned chiffon with a mandarin collar, opening at the top and ties at the neckline. Gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and a gathered seam at the hem with a wide flounce. Satin lining.
Short-sleeved blouse in a viscose weave with a V-neck and diagonal buttons down the front.
Short, V-neck dress in soft denim with a collar, press-studs down the front and short sleeves. Chest pockets with a pleat, a detachable tie belt at the waist, and short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip at one side and loop at the back. Soft pile linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Long-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a double-layered skirt in glittery tulle. Picot trim around the neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and a decorative bow at the waist.
Blouse in an airy crêpe weave with a small stand-up collar, scalloped trim at the top and concealed buttoning.
Trainers in mesh and imitation leather with a padded edge and tongue, elasticated lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Short dress in a soft rib knit with a foldover polo neck, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.

Long dress in a Tencel™ lyocell and viscose weave with lace sections. Round neckline at the front, an open section at the back with narrow ties at the back of the neck, a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Bracelet in soft faux fur with a snap-on strap and soft toy head with embroidered details at one end. Size 3.5x17 cm.
5-pocket jeans in stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and button and skinny, ankle-length legs with raw-edge hems.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button and raw-edge, frayed hems.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Length from 1 cm to 3 cm.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted lenses. UV-protective.
Swim top and long trousers in UV-protective fabric. Top with long raglan sleeves and a small collar. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist. UPF 50.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top. Short shorts with an elasticated waist and lace-trimmed hems.
Shorts in soft, airy viscose jersey with covered elastication at the waist and small frill trims with overlocked edges at the hems.
Boots in semi-shiny imitation leather with an ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Knee-length coat in a textured weave with notch lapels, concealed buttons down the front, welt side pockets, visible, raw-edge seams and a single back vent. Unlined.
Top in soft, crinkled jersey with a frilled collar, V-neck and long raglan sleeves. Smocking and a frill trim at the cuffs and hem.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a covered elastic waistband. Lined.
Jacket in soft pile with a collar, large buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and side pockets. Gently rounded hem that is slightly longer at the back and front. Lined.

Biker jacket with quilted shoulders, a tab with a press-stud at the neck and a diagonal zip down the front. Zipped side pockets, a small decorative flap front pocket and long sleeves with sturdy ribbed jersey undersides and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Wide jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Shirt dress in a soft cotton weave with a collar and button placket. Long sleeves with a tab and button, side pockets and a detachable, braided belt in imitation suede at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with decorative gathers down the sleeves.

Calf-length skirt in soft, patterned cotton twill with a lightly brushed finish. High waist with a wide, double-layered waistband that has gathers all round for added volume. Concealed zip in one side with a hook-and-eye fastening at the top. Unlined.
Shorter jumper in a rib knit with a deep V-neck and draped knot detail at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Triangle bikini top with scalloped trims and gathered, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Ties at the back and back of the neck.
Sleeveless dress in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Buttons at the back, a seam at the waist and a flared, glittery skirt in two layers of tulle. Lined.
Jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves,a chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Joggers in washed, lightweight denim with an elasticated drawstring waist, front pockets and tapered legs.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and slim legs.
Sleeveless jersey dress in a short and fitted style.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a high waist and medium coverage at the back.
Bolero in soft pointelle cotton with buttons at the top, long sleeves and a ribbed, scalloped trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
